content.detailedDescription:
Very clear and still nearly moonless august night just after dark where many stars were visible.  standing on my deck i was looking skyward and a  bright movement caught my eye.  it appeared in the southwest sky off in the distance.  it was the most beautiful hue of green i've ever seen with a bright neon like glow.  its shape was like that of a long tubular balloon,  with someone slightly bending both ends although it's movement was quite swift and appeared as though the tail of it caught up to the front and it disappeared.  it seemed as though it was headed towards ground with at a slight angle before it disappeared. the sighting lasted 3 seconds, it was fast.

i knew it was something i wasn't familiar with, no weather phenomenon i was aware of ever looked like that.  being a us army infantry veteran i can identify aircraft related to my experience and it didn't resemble any.  i was taken aback for a bit because i had no idea what it could've been and still have no idea other than to me it was a highly unexplainable event that has stuck with me and likely will the rest of my life.
content.summary: Warm green neon color tubular object appeared to arc slightly towards the ground  then it appeared the tail caught up to the front and it disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
On two different nights approx 5 nights apart i have seen something i can not explain. on both nights i saw what at first glance appeared to be a star at approx. the 10:00 position in the sky and wnw of my location. on both occasions the star was in about the same position in the sky. while looking at the star i could see the top part change from white to red and then change back to white very quickly. at times i could also see a blue/green light on the right side of the star that again would change back to white very quickly. during the time i watched it ( approx. 15 minutes ) it never changed position in the sky which pretty much rules out a plane. i am 64 years old and was sober and wide awake on both occasions. 

i would love to hear a scientific explanation of this phenomenon.
content.summary: Star that changed colors

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was headed downtown with my friend in my truck. i saw four white lights in formation coming down the river, in formation. i rolled down my window and told my friend to look at these helicopters. within a minute they came directly at my truck. they went up in the air as a vehicle approached from behind us. i looked over at the man and woman in that vehicle who did not so much as acknowledge me. i almost knew that they wouldn't see it... the vehicle passed, and the lights came down around us, two on our left, one directly above us, and one on the right. i had my head out of the driver's window looking up at this now white rectangle of light (as an observation or instrument utility mode?) i could see what seemed like light trailing up the sides of the rectangle, outlining the shape of a dark sphere, though i am not sure, i really strained to see some ship and can not be certain. this rectangular light was perhaps ten feet above us. the two white spheres remained on our left, one on the right. the rectangle then moved to the lights on the left and (simultaneously?) became a sphere like the other three. it revolved around the two lights on the left one at a time. i believe three clockwise revolutions. the three objects crossed the road in front of us, and the fourth object was then circled. the lights then moved down the street as i approached a red light (top of brittania hill now). i stopped, and the four lights stopped close to a heritage building in the middle of carling avenue where it splits into robertson road. i told my friend i would "floor it", and catch up the the objects when the light changed. instead, as i left the stop-line at high speed, and accelerated, they matched my motion perfectly. they stayed this distance adhead of us until i approached lincoln fields. the objects then picked up speed and elevation. i saw three of these objects spin off into space, this time, clockwise, and in three revolutions disappeared high in the atmosphere. my friend saw all four do this, i missed one since i was driving. the last one to leave was so high that he was more to the south, almost beside us and perhaps 85 degrees to the horizon. the others seemed lower and more to the east as they left. there were perhaps ten seconds between each light doing this, the entire high altitude depart spiral of the four lights taking perhaps fourty seconds. i found out that there was a third person who saw the lights doing something "strange" in the area of lincoln fields. my friend and i heard this the next day at our school. i found out many years later that it was in the news perhaps a few minutes before our event, several hundred miles away, across the great lakes.

i saw white lights in that general area on another occasion floating over the river -- they seemed to be in no rush to leave, and a group of three orange lights in 1992 with my girlfriend. we saw these three orange lights (one sphere, and two triangle with rounded bases (pointing outwards from the sphere). we saw these objects very high in the sky, and it only lasted a second or two.

three sightings within 1.5 km, and all within five years, and never again, though i've moved away. i'm reporting this almost thirty years later. i've reported it to mufon previously, to nufor, to the nrc in canada -- directly to dr. mcnamara. i've also written stanton friedman about it, when i discovered there was a newspaper report online that same day, with a very similar description. he pointed out that nobody is correlating sightings. i think this sight does a great job of that. i'm not reporting the other two events since they are rather insignificant in comparison to what i would call my close encounter of the fourth kind, though i did not see an alien, they were definitely taking a close look at us. i can supply the full names of all witnesses.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: 4 white spheres approached vehicle, surrounded us. elevated, descended back as a car approached. circled each other! travelled up the road, stopped when i did, started again when i did, spiralled into atmosphere. 3rd witness on ground. newspaper 500 miles

content.detailedDescription: Went out my back door about 11:10 pm, looked to the left (east) and saw 10 - 15 reddish glowing twinkling starlike points of light traveling slowly at same speed to the north. i could see them pass between a house and a line of trees about 50 yards away. impossible to tell how far away they were. they kept coming, passing behind the line of trees. i estimate 50 - 100 or more passed by in about ten minutes. they were not in a formation, just randomly passing by. after about ten minutes there were no more. i had no idea what they could be. i was not afraid, just amazed and curious.
content.summary: Many starlike objects travelling low in sky going north, all slowly at same speed.

content.detailedDescription:
On 8/7/13 i reported on here an object/lights i was observing in the western sky and uploaded two still photos.  on 1/4/13, i observed similar objects in the eastern sky which i also took photos of and a short video.  i never uploaded these. i am uploading them now.  if i am seeing planets or some other explainable objects can someone please let me know.  

what is funny is that when i took the pictures on january 4, 2013, they objects are in almost the same spot as the photos in august 7,2013 and when you zoom in to view the pictures, they are the same shape, but have noticeable differences.  each time i thought i was only taking a picture of one object, but two different objects were seen in the photos on all shots.  

again, on these photos you must download the pictures if possible and zoom in to see the shape and the coloration of each object.  i think the video shows a lot of coloration of the main object i was observing.
content.summary: Red, star-like light in eastern sky january 4, 2013

content.detailedDescription: Hi, nearly everyone in my family has seen a ufo.   i was skeptical myself until i saw one.  the one i saw was similar to one i've seen videos of on tv... moving in an up down, left, right, irrattic; yet, apparently a deliberate motion.  (too fast for a harrier jet, or, a weather balloon).  it was opening day of deer season,  while i sat in the woods with my rifle nov.15th,  1990.  however, what has compelled me to write this is not my own personal experience, but, my fathers story, confirmed independantly 20 yrs. later by my best friend.  my father, the best, and most honorable man i've ever known told me this story......."i was delivering fuel oil to an elderly couples home when i noticed an object hovering, and shining down a beam of light.  it didn't make a sound.  i didn't want to alert and scare the elderly couple...And watched as it flew away toward the air base without a sound in the blink on an eye."  my father told no one about this, yet, trusted me with the story.  in the 70's "people would talk and think you were crazy".  here's  the kicker-talking with my best friend 20 yrs. later, he reinterated the story to me with the exact description verbatum . later.  my friend had two witnesses with him, my father thought he had none.  i ask you,  what are the odds two people you trust the most,  tell the same story independant of each other,  20 yrs. apart?   believe-
content.summary: Father witnessed event...Best friend described witnessing same sighting 20  yrs.  later; independent of each other.  father, highly credible!

content.detailedDescription: On way to store, saw light on a clear sky just before dawn, light did not look like a star. i stopped in road for a few minutes, observed what appeared to be 1 light turning into two lights, to 3 lights, all closely compacted together, back to 1 light, and repeating cycle.. clouds began to form around object though no other clouds in sky at the moment.  clouds around object appeared displaced/fuzzy, but light shined through brightly.  before clouds appeared (dura ration of cloud appearance was less than 3 minutes) object appeared to have jellyfish shape where smaller lights were where tentacles would be (if it actually were a jellyfish i'm the sky).
content.summary: One fluttering pulsing bluish light changing in intensity become 2-3, then back to 1

content.detailedDescription:
I was in front of my computer facing the window. (i like to watch the sundown while i am writing my film reviews/checking facebook and rest my sight looking through the window and the horizon.
i was the beginning of the sundown and all the sky is pink and blue.  i usually can't see any star in the sky/horizon (my window point of view) but this time i saw it. i mean, this is vancouver so its always either raining or grey sky. but this is the first year we have so much sun/clear sky. suddenly i see in the sky this bright light like a planet or a star. looked like venus or mars but i've never seen it before, all these nights.. nothing. so i think it's because it's the first time we have so many clear nights and might be a planet. but it was bigger than the planets we use to see like mars or venus. probably double or triple the size. so i begin to doubt about it. specially because of the orange/red color... looked like it was reflecting the sun in the horizon. so i tried to get my cell phone that i was charging right besides me. and boom! it was gone! just 10 minutes. i mean even a star doesn't do that! the reason i wanted to take the photo was because i wasn't sure if it was a planet and i wanted to compare the colors of the star or planet later on when the sun was down... also i thought it would make me find out if it was a star o not. but it was gone! just like that.
no movements, no hovering no nothing. just a big red/orange/white sphere seemed like it was reflecting the sundown. not sure.
the  sky is dark now and no sign of that light. 
i really would like to know if this is a star or someone has seen something like that.
content.summary: Big red/orange and white sphere.. looked bigger than a planet we usually see. no movements.

content.detailedDescription: My mom was on a walk through my neighborhood when she saw a blueish white orb in the sky. she said it was stationary and appeared to flicker slightly. the object was bigger than a star and was about a mile away from her. she took out her phone to take a picture, but when she looked up it had disappeared.
content.summary: My mom saw a white-blue orb hovering in the sky and then it disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was watching the lightning storms east of my house, i looked up and saw a orange ball phasing bright to dim. when it was dim i could see and outline of a dagger or arrow head that was black. i double check were jupiter was, and iss was, but this was below the cloud cover. it was also sitting still then making a oval pattern in the same spot in the sky for about a min. then it reappeared did the same thing over a period of 15 minutes... i was facing the se facing larch mt from battle ground ( over skamania co) my line of sight was about 35/45 degrees above the horizon. mean while my cat was howling and screaming and very guarded. he has never acted this way before.
content.summary: Phasing orange ball with solid black triangle inside

content.detailedDescription: I was watching the lightning storms east of my house, i looked up and saw a orange ball phasing bright to dim. when it was dim i could see and outline of a dagger or arrow head that was black. i double check were jupiter was, and iss was, but this was below the cloud cover. it was also sitting still then making a oval pattern in the same spot in the sky for about a min. then it reappeared did the same thing over a period of 15 minutes... i was facing the se facing larch mt from battle ground ( over skamania co) my line of sight was about 35/45 degrees above the horizon. mean while my cat was howling and screaming and very guarded. he has never acted this way before.
content.summary: Phasing orange ball with solid black triangle inside

content.detailedDescription:
We were in the back yard having a campfire at my uncles place outside of winlock when we looked up straight above us and thought we saw a satellite. it was moving very slowly for a satellite much too slow then it got really bright brighter than any star. it moved on for a few seconds and then dimned down to its original light.
 it moved on for a few more seconds then it got extremely bright again. it repeated this pattern until it was out of sight. yeah and the course of maybe 20 30 minutes we saw three of these objects doing the same thing. they were heading what look like to be from the south going to the north. what really made this significant was how slow it moved and how bright it became and how it dimned and then became bright again. about an hour later we saw another one coming from the north heading south. this one was further away from us not directly overhead. 
once again it did the same pattern. the first time we saw this was somewhere between 10 o'clock or 11 and then the 4th one the very last one was at midnight. i have never seen satellites behave like that before. i have never seen satellites move that slowly before!
content.summary: Look like satellite, moved much slower than one, brightened more than any star then faded to original light, moved on then bright  again, repeated pattern till gone. saw 3 separate ufo, 1 from n to s.

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?
was outside smoking a cigarette
2. what made you first notice the object?
the brightness and closeness (aircraft are never that close)
3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
the first thing i saw was a light in the sky i looked for faa lights and realized i was seeing something unidentified
4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.
witness reddish amber single light heading 235 degrees southwest. had no faa lights single light only. light appeared to change color intensity from red to orange the light was very intense. 
5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.
excited to have opprotunity to witness one
6. how did you lose sight of the object?
was below clouds and it flew into a low cloud or fog before i lost it. picture taken with iphone 4s stock camera app.
content.summary: Appeared to go against the wind

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my apartment at around 8:25, when i saw a beautiful sunset, i went out but then i remembered that i have seen many things that i regret not having the camera with me. you will see i am a nature fun and taking pictures is my hobby.
i went upstairs to the 7th floor to have a better view, and it was an amazing sunset, i took the first picture and it was just what i saw, then i took a second one and immediately i saw the object i could not believe it, i was shocked,the first thought that came to my mind was an ufo and instinctively i took another picture, nothing came up. i saw the picture again and could not believe what is on the picture, i have been trying to find out but there is no logical explanation to what is on the picture. i took another picture yesterday of a clear light that was not moving and what is very very odd is that the object i took the picture was quite visible and could have been an airplane or something bigger, what is wierd is that comparing the object of the picture taken the 8th of august, the light on the picture seems smaller than the object which means it might be a very big object. my cam is just a common one, not a funcy one, so i can not take special pictures. 
the object is completely round and on the picture appears like a golf ball, with white and sort of grey texture whith like three holes or i don't know how to describe, may be lights, i can not tell. i cannot say aif it was moving or how it was as when i took the picture it was not a visible object.
describing the feelings i had is quite difficult, i was shocked by what i saw on the picture and still am, i know deep within myself that is not an illusion is something that to our eyes we do not see, yet exists.
i believe there is a reason for things to happen and i just wanted to contact an organization or group that could help to find out what is on the picture. i will send you the sequence of the 3 pictures taken, the cam time is one hour behind because i do not know how to fix it. the first one was taken at 20:46 although it shows 19:46, the second one with the object was taken a minute later, and the last one was taken immediately after i saw the object on the 2nd pic. if you see deeply into the first pic there is a light but it could be a simple light.
content.summary: Sunset picture and no object when taken, then it appears an unidentified object on the picture perfectly round. took other pic and nothing came up.

content.detailedDescription: I was out in front of our house playing catch with my two sons. when one of my sons called out "what the heck is that?" so i looked up almost right above us when i caught sight of a strange object floating across the sky. i ran into the house and grabbed my digital camera, and adjusted the settings to get a good look at it. i was estonished to see that it wasnt 1 object but 3 and it was changing shape. i couldnt believe my eyes when i noticed apendages under and over the top object. the ufo continued on a ne path until i lost sight of it. not even 30 seconds later a helicopter flew past us in the direction of the ufo.
content.shape: Blimp,   Circle,   Disc,   Egg,   Oval,   Saturn-like,   Sphere,   Star-like
content.summary: I was out in front of our house playing catch with my two sons. when one of my sons called out "what the heck is that?" so i looked up almost right above us when i caught sight of a strange object floating across the sky.(i have a recording)

content.detailedDescription:
my family was at a local park watching an outdoor movie. i happened to be observing the stars because many of the street lights were shut off or lacking in that particular area.

facing north i noticed what i first thought was an airplane. a second later i realized there were no regulation lights of any kind, only 3 dull white lights in triangle formation. to be precise, one light was closely followed by two lights. they were equally spaced. there must have been a solid object holding them in place, but it was only a sillhouette if anything, leaving the only the lights visible.

pointing at the object i asked my wife, "what is that?"

she replied, "i'm not sure. maybe birds?"

the object continued it's flight path north and vanished from site. (my wife believes it vanished quicker than it should have as it couldn't have traveled out of our field of vision in that time.)

"there is no way those are birds" i said. "have you ever known a bird formation to have only 3 birds?" 

we both agreed that if it had been birds, they would have been low enough that we would have seen some semblance of flapping or some waivering motion to indicate biological flight. this object was perfectly geometric and traveled a mechanically precise straight line. there is no doubt whatsoever that this was mechanical in nature.

the lights were dull and rather unspectacular compared to what one might believe a ufo to look like. although, i believe this to be the point.

the only error the object made to garner notice was that it was flying very low. so low in fact, that we should have been able to hear it or feel the vibration. also, the lights were not even as bright as the dullest stars above them, but each light was at least 3 times as big as the largest star in the sky.

although many folks' eyes were fixed to the projection screen at this outdoor movie, there were over 100 people in attendance at this event. there are potentially many more witnesses. i sincerely hope others witnessed this and report as well.
content.summary: Triangular craft with 3 dull white lights spaced evenly. object flew straight path heading due north  1-200 feet above treeline at a public event.

content.detailedDescription: this looks like a very bright point of light, a point like object. i observed it with bynoculars and still it was a very bright point of light, very low, very close to the florida turnpike in area code 33176 or 33186. very visible around 8:10pm, but later after dark it was really bright, like a very high street light, many people should have seen this. i manage to get many minutes of footage from a hd camcorder on a tripod, amazing view. i have seen this object many times before, this is sighting number nine since 07/22/13. i am attaching part of this footage.
content.summary: Start-like object, a bright point of light.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: This was a very uneasy feeling. the ufo just c���me from no. where.
content.summary: White oblong shape headed west. no sound . was  not  a plane. there was. a jet. it was  headed toward them . i was out side watering flowered when this thing come over made no sound. and left very fast.

content.detailedDescription: Friends and i were sitting outside around a campfire, i just so happened to look up and see a red/ orange orb traveling unbelievably fast across the sky. there was no sign of deceleration or fading and it continued nw.
content.summary: Orange red orb traveling very quickly across the sky without fading, and changed direction west

content.detailedDescription: I was out walking from 8:55pm to 10pm (i always check my time to make sure i get an hour in) and at 9:40 pm i saw a bright orange light flying out of any flight path (i see planes all the time and know the paths they fly). the object made no sound and had no blinking lights. there were lots of clouds so i know it was pretty low. the object made a sharp turn and got behind some trees. when i ran out into an opening it was gone. i looked around for any neighbors to point it out to them, but no one was outside. i did notice a car slow down near me, but i don't know if they did that to view the object. i live well north of the nearest large city (columbus, ohio) and i know where the airport is and i see aircraft all the time and am familiar with the flight paths. there is a small aircraft airfield (don scott field) well south of me, but this object appeared from the north and turned northeast. i lost it when it got behind some trees and was gone by the time i was able to get to a clearing. i attached two pictures...The original from my phone and one where i added some text to describe it. i don't have a smart phone so there was no zoom, otherwise the picture would have been much bigger. the object seemed quite low, but i heard nothing.
content.summary: Bright orange light with no sound; abruptly changed direction.

content.detailedDescription: Gatineau august 2013
content.summary: Black spot in picture

content.detailedDescription: I was coming back from a city thats a few miles down the road from were im from about 10 minutes from my house. it was about 4am not many cars were on the road and it was me and my best friend coming from another friends house. i was in the passenger seat while my friend was driving and i was barely staying up because i was really tired ready to get home. what first made me notice the object was the speed and the brightness of it. at first i dint mention it to my friend while she was driving but i kept my eye  on it and it was follwing us down the road , it was right beside us in the sky but it was moving fast too fast , not a airplanes speed thats what caught my attention. i thought it might be a plane or a shooting star all because of the brightness and its speed. i finally sat up and told my friend because i dint want to be the only one looking at so we were both amazed how it was keeping up with us as we went down the road. it was flcikering like a light bulb and getting bigger and smaller. we finally stopped the car on the road i live on and jumped out the car and it stopped directly on top of us, we were obsessed by the lights and the fact that it stopped when we did. we literally starred at the lights for 30 mintues. it started to get bright and then dim and get small then it would change its shape and it look transparent with many bright beautiful colors almost like it had wings , more like a butterfly. we thought we were seeing stuff so we decided to get back in the car to see if it would follow us so we drive downtown about 2 mins down the road and it folowed us all the way downtown. we stopped at the stoplight and made a u turn and it literally follwed us and then switched sides thats how i knew it was something odd. the speed was crazy it cant even explain it but i know it was no plane.The entire time we were so anxious to see what it was we dint even realize how how late it was, we were so interested in seeing what it was , something was drawing us to because it gave us a peaceful, relaxed , curious feeling. we reach my street again and then it slowed down, we played pick- a- boo with it, driving the car up slow a lil bit past the house to the right once u reach my street, and we seen the light at the peak of the house and then we moved pushed on the gas all the way down the road and it just shot off at the same time with us . we parked in front of my house and it just sat there for 3 hours and we watched it and took pictures. i dint want to go in the house i wanted to watch it all night, it was so beautiful, the lights and the way it would jump around.! apparently there were two lights in the sky that night, i kept a eye on it once my friend pulled off and went home and she called seconds later that the light was following her but i told her i was looking right at, once she got home she clamied her radio in her car never has static but when she reached home her radio completley started to make that noise and the light just disappeared. i was so obsessed with the light i could not get it off my mind. after that night i started to see it often outside my house around 2am in the night, i was always alone when i seen it and many nights i seenn it change its colors , jump around dim its light, move up and down, it almost looked as if it had wings comming out the side but you could see the colors flashing. sitting in my car one night i happen to see it again and me and my friend the same girl was just sitting in the car with the car off and we seen the light, we decided to record but u could not see the light on the camera off the cellphone so i choose not to record. but on picture mode u could see it clearly and it was jumping around on the camera like crazy we dint understand. we freaked out when my radio turned on without my keys in the ignition and we both cried from fear of not knowing what caused that to happen but it did it right after our phones died. i continued to see it contstantly after that just me im not sure of my friend.The picture i have is from the night i seen it change colors and change its shape it was breath taken nothing like i have ever seen in my life. it made me feel so concerned to know what it could be or how could i help. for several weeks i became obsessed with researching staying up late hours online about what i was seeing, and having weird dreams. i have not seen this since year ago. but i have seen things like these for several years just never spoke about it.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Boomerang,   Flash,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Teardrop,   Unknown
content.summary: Bright light, incredible speed, blinking and changing colors

content.detailedDescription: Dont know what it was. first one glowed as it went down. second one was black. both looked like they went to the ground but i cant find anything yet.
content.summary: Dark object descending slowly. wife said she saw a red one descending before and much closer to our house. looked and found nothing.

content.detailedDescription: 11:30am me/neighbor went to complex pool.  noone else there. approx an hour(?) after lying on lounge chairs, friend says, "look, what is that?". i said, "where?". she pointed to se high in sky. looked like grocery bag (dark beige/brownish) floating sideways across sky in northeast direction. then it looked like it was balloons attached to something, but color changed to very light pink/beige with weird outlines, like a pencil or pen outlined the object onto the sky but with the weird color thing going on. we jumped out of our seats & i ran to northeast side of pool area and my friend/neighbor ran to north side of pool area. i saw what i can hardly explain. it was a gigantic thing that looked like a thing with round things on it. it moved slowly, for about a minute beyond treeline. how did it get there so fast and get so big? and what is it? my friend didn't see it when it was gigantic, she was on the other side of the pool house. then we walked back toward lounge chairs, and i see it again suddenly across the sky to the northwest. i thought it might be a second thing i was seeing. i told my friend/neighbor, "look! there it is again!" she saw it too and it was flying around crazy like and it was far away again and the light from the sun reflected off of it and it was very metallic. and when it moved back and forth and fluttering or whatever you call it, up and down, it looked white, black & silvery (but thick silver, like fluid silver), when it changed direction, it took on a different "color", and it was like a boomerang kind of, but it wasnt a boomerang at all when it was gigantic.  i don't know what that shape was. i've never seen that shape before.  just that it had round things on it.  i think the beige/pink color was the desert sand (las vegas) reflecting off it's surface. and then it got tiny as it moved toward northwest and disappeared.  my neighbor/friend and i have both complained of missing time, alot of time. we just never thought it might be due to aliens or whatever that was.  but now, i think it might.  too much of a coincidence that she and i lose time and that we saw what we saw together.  if she wasn't with me to see it, i would not have believed my eyes.  last night i went to empty trash at 2:00am(?). i "lost time" & found myself in the back left corner of my complex, not able to remember how i got there.  there would be no reason for me to go there.  all of a sudden, i found myself there, and things looked "weird", can't explain it.  i felt lost. i came home and i was gone awhile but i don't know how long.  i am completely freaked out. so is my neighbor/friend. we are educated and intelligent. but i am very shaken up becuz of this incident and how it may relate to my "missing time" lately.
content.summary: Beige upside down u flying sideways high in sky;  changed appearance, gigantic, disappeared, reappeared far off, sunlight reflecting off surface, metallic/white/black/metallic/white/black and went away

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were walking our dog in the backyard around 8:00 on december 23, 2012. he yelled at me that it looked like an aircraft was on fire. i ran out there and looked up in the night sky. it was cloudy but where there were breaks in the clouds we watched what looked like a fireball in the sky moving slowly like an aircraft from south to north. it traveled for a couple minutes and we watched the fire ball (we could not make out an aircraft). i told todd that if it was an aircraft on fire it should be losing altitude but it looked like it was maintaining it. todd then said to me "did it just stop?" and i said it looked like it did - then it grew an enormous halo around it. i thought maybe it was a rocket that blew up because of the size of the halo and as high as it seemed in the air (extremely high - not at typical aircraft altitude). after a few seconds of just sitting there and growing this enormous halo it suddenly it started moving back at us, following the same pattern we had watched it move from south to north but now in reverse. it did not bank left or right.  this time though what had taken it several minutes to do - took it just seconds (maybe just a minute) this time and as it raced south - the halo grew so large that by the time it got over the south horizon of our pond the halo literally expanded out or blew out and whatever it was simply disappeared. there was no feeling of a shock wave or any change in the atmosphere around us when it 'blew out'. i cannot explain it. i reported it (at the risk of sounding like a lunatic) to the sarasota sheriff's office. the halo started off red but as it traveled over us to the southern horizon it changed colors to lighter red, then orange tinted then almost cream colored at the time it blew out. it also appeared that when it reversed it's pattern, it came back at a much lower altitude and actually frightened us.
content.summary: Fireball or orb moving overhead, growing a halo, then reversing direction and changing color

content.detailedDescription: Four blinking pulsating lights maintained formation behind delta rocket launch- then disappeared abruptly and then two showed up again behind rocket as the rocket went out of atmosphere-- and then disappeard when rocket no longer seen.  i got a bad headache afterwards that still hasn't gone away- sighting was in ft. pierce, florida- which is below melbourne, fl.  eight of us saw the launch--three people questioned the blinking going on. someone in our group took an iphone photo/video, not sure if it came out.
content.summary: After photo class in ft. pierce, fl-- outside classroom- 8 witnesses, when delta launch went off- 4 blinking starlike lights pulsating formation of rectangle, following rocket then disappeared when left atmosphere, then two showed up behind rocket.

content.detailedDescription: its the 4th of july and my friend and i went to bbq at a friends in briggsdale. around 8:00 is when we first seen it fell from the sky like a drop of rain fell down in a straight line then started to almost "dance like" above the ground and then continued in the sky all 3 of us seen it for about 20 to 30mins the longest i have ever seen one. it dropped from the sky a few more times the same way we seen it the first time . the only odd thing i really remember is at one point it started to come closer and in the field not to far from where it was hovering we could see this "human like"  person watching us watch it very creepy it never moved but when the light was gone the figure was gone as well. i have a total of 5 videos that i took that night but i am only gona post this one if anyone wishes to see the other videos or would like to know more about this please contact me .
content.summary: Independence day u.F.O. 20013

content.detailedDescription: I was at the applegate zoo with my daughter and grandson.  it is my grandsons 5th birthday today and he wanted to go there and see the animals.  while admiring the caged animals, i looked up to see some birds in the shade trees above and that's when the round shiny object caught my eye.  i observed it for a minute to see if it was an airplane in motion but it didn't move and it had no lights that i could see.  when i decided that it was not an airplane, i called it to my daughters attention.  she, too, agreed with me that we were looking at something that is not man-made.  she got the chills at that moment.  i then called several zoo employees over to see this object.  they were also amazed and could not come up with an explanation as to what we were looking at.  the object remained within view for several hours, from at least 11 am when i first noticed it until around 2:30 pm when the the sky became overcast when it could no longer be seen.  i called my husband who works at merced college to tell him to take a look at it.  he even got the science instructors involved and they viewed it with a telescope.  they could not come up with an explanation as to what we were observing.  i feel as if we are being observed by something other than mankind.  this is not a common sighting for me but i notice that it seems to be a common sighting in general.  i will go out later today if the cloud-cover clears and try to find this ufo again.
content.summary: Round white object was motionless, straight up in sky, was not as high as jetplanes that  were also in area.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my stiars and i noticed that a firball type orb seemed to come out of the light from the moon, or from behind it. it felt like there was no sound at all in the air, like the sound waves had stoped. the air felt heavy. it was yellowish in the middle, surrounded by a red orange glow. it went so far in such a slow motion. the it flew up and up and up untill i couldnt see it anymore. straight up to the stars.
content.summary: Fire ball

content.detailedDescription: The city was hectic due to two window cleaners hanging off a falling scafold on 57th street and 8th avenue. i was walking towards port auth on 8th avenue and 42nd street when a couple of ambulances rushed pass me and i looked up towards the east when i saw this object hovering towards the right side of the chrysler building. helicopters and a plane passed by it. the more i looked at it, the more i realized i had no idea what i was looking at. i was able to take a picture and as soon as it did it vanished. i took the picture with my iphone 5, i know it's not the best picture but i was happy to take it.
content.summary: It didn't look like anything i've seen
